page.title: 05EDUCATION 1
page.content: {A STATE MIDDLE SCHOOL} The headmaster of the{Raleigh School has been there for 4 years,during which there have been changes in teaching methods.Practical work and {enviromental studies}have increased and there has been growth in tech_ nology due to{computers.}There is also more oral work although reading and writing are still considered vital. Now 300 pupils attend the school, this figure has decreased over the past decade although it is now rising again.This slight increase is due to the fact that Raleigh is a first and middle school.There has also been a rise in the{birth_rate}and parents may choose which school to send their children to.The increase is more or less the same as other schools. The{school hours}are:_8:55 to 3:15.
